item.title: A Streamlit Data App for local weather
item.description:
A Data App

Around the same time I discovered the first Python frameworks for developing Data Apps, and I fell in love with the idea of using them to build Data Narratives and demos. I decided that it would be a good idea to build my own local weather app using online data from meteobeguda, and the obvious choices were Plotly Dash and Streamlit. Many more options are available nowadays, but I went for Streamlit for a very powerful reason that still holds true today: free and easy deployment for Github-hosted, open source apps.
